location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 4156/44 'Lieut Col L G W Hamber'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 8; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains papers regarding potential employment opportunities for Lieutenant-Colonel Hamber, and detailing his particular expertise on the subject of Russia. The primary correspondents are: Government of India; India Office; Foreign Office.
